text: Karłów () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Radków, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately south-west of Radków, west of Kłodzko, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Karłów
